name: travel_delays
rows: Roadwork on I-81 southbound between .1 miles south of Exit 170A: PA 115 SOUTH - BEAR CREEK and .5 miles north of Exit 168: HIGHLAND PARK BLVD/WILKES-BARRE. All lanes now open.
Roadwork on I-81 northbound between .7 miles north of Exit 168: HIGHLAND PARK BLVD/WILKES-BARRE and .1 miles south of Exit 170A: PA 115 SOUTH - BEAR CREEK. All lanes now open.
Crash on I-81 southbound 2.5 miles north of Exit 90: PA 72 - LEBANON. There is a lane restriction.
Crash on I-95 northbound between Exit 8: RIDLEY PARK and Exit 9B/9A: PA 420 - ESSINGTON / PROSPECT PARK. All lanes now open.
Crash on I-84 westbound at Exit: I-81 SOUTH - WILKES-BARRE. There is a ramp restriction.

Roadwork on RICHMOND ST / CHRISTOPHER COLUMBUS BL / DELAWARE AV / OREGON AV both directions at Exit: I-95 NORTH - NORTHEAST PHILA. There is a ramp closure.
